name: fireball-subgraphs
description: bundle of subgraphs for fireball.gg usage
author: dudendy <a.dude.koval@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy:main:stage: cd gotchi-main && graph deploy --product hosted-service dudendy/kratoman
scripts.deploy:main:prod: cd gotchi-main && graph deploy --product hosted-service orden-gg/main
scripts.deploy:verse:stage: cd gotchiverse && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ dudendy/gotchiverse
scripts.deploy:verse:prod: cd gotchiverse && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ orden-gg/gotchiverse
scripts.deploy:forge:stage: cd forge && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ dudendy/forge
scripts.deploy:identity:stage: cd gotchi-identity && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ dudendy/kratoman
